rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Widely spaced entry with Vastu-optimized orientation to the east for auspicious energy. Wheelchair accessible ramp integrated.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open space that doubles as living and dining area, ensuring natural light and cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles. Large windows on the east.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Eco-friendly kitchen using solar-powered devices. Placed in the southeast for prosperity as per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom and ample natural light from east-facing windows to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated servant's quarters near the service entrance; includes a compact kitchenette and storage area. Accessible with wheelchair friendly design.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office located on the first floor with ample natural light from south-facing windows. Designed to be quiet and inspiring per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Balanced bedroom ensuring privacy and proper ventilation. Windows placed strategically in the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another balanced bedroom designed for comfort, with access to natural light from the south-east and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with natural ventilation and light. Designed with Vastu in mind to promote restfulness.

rooms.name: Study/Reading Room
rooms.description: A quiet study area that doubles as a reading room, located with south-facing windows for balanced energy.
